title: Manage Expiring Inventory (FEFO)
description: In a food-grade warehouse, an operator picking an order must be directed to pick the batch with the earliest expiration date first.

tasks.description: The system generates a picking task for a specific food item.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new picking task is created.

tasks.description: The system, following First-Expired-First-Out (FEFO) logic, directs the picker to the location containing the batch with the soonest expiration date.
tasks.expected_outcome: The picker is given the correct location to ensure proper stock rotation.

tasks.description: The picker scans the location and the product's batch number to confirm they are picking the correct lot.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system validates the pick against the FEFO logic.
